tasks.title: Create Profile Screen
tasks.description: Create a user profile screen with avatar display, account settings, and system preferences. Should include dark/light mode toggle and notification settings.

tasks.title: Add Camera Feed Details Screen
tasks.description: Create detailed camera feed screen showing full-screen live video, recording controls, PTZ controls, and camera settings. Include motion detection zones configuration.

tasks.title: Add Notification Settings
tasks.description: Add notification settings to the profile screen allowing users to configure alert preferences, sound settings, and escalation procedures for different alert types.

tasks.title: Add Alert Details Screen
tasks.description: Create detailed alert view screen showing expanded information about security incidents, including timeline, related camera feeds, evidence gallery, and resolution history.
